titleStmt.title: Reform'd devotions, in meditations, hymns, and petitions, for every day in the week, and every holiday in the year divided into parts.
titleStmt.author: Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.
Birchley, William, 1613-1669. Devotions in the ancient way of offices.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
